columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: RESRC_TYPE_ID
columns.description: Reservation pool for patient's reservation for a hospital stay.

columns.name: RESRC_SUBTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of stay for patient's reservation at the hospital.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: SCHED_ARRIVAL_DATE
columns.description: Scheduled arrival date for the patient's hospital stay reservation.

columns.name: SCHED_ARRIVAL_TIME_C_NAME
columns.description:
Scheduled arrival time for the patient's hospital stay reservation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Morning


Midday


Afternoon


Evening

columns.name: SCHED_DEPARTURE_DATE
columns.description: Scheduled departure date for the patient's hospital stay reservation.

columns.name: SCHED_DEPARTURE_TIME_C_NAME
columns.description:
Scheduled departure time for the patient's hospital stay reservation.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SCHED_ARRIVAL_TIME_C_NAME

columns.name: RESV_INDFNT_YN
columns.description:
Determine if this reservation is an indefinite stay.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: RESV_CONFRM_YN
columns.description:
If this reservation has been confirmed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: RESV_INDFNT_YN
